item.title: Prompt Engineering: The Art of Talking to AI
item.description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of AI, one skill has emerged as surprisingly crucial: prompt engineering ‚Äî the art of crafting inputs to get the best outputs from language models. What was once a niche concept has become a fundamental skill for effectively working with AI systems. Let’s dive into what this means and why it matters. üîç What Is Prompt Engineering? At its core, prompt engineering is the practice of carefully crafting inputs to AI systems to elicit desired outputs.
